Constantly seeking podcast and book suggestions. Living a plant-based life. Probably drinking coffee. Advocating for self-improvment and constant selflessness.

I began my studies at Duke University in 2017, studying a combination of global health, computer science, and entrepreneurship. I want to create my own major studying how tech entrepreneurship can reduce inequities and improve health outcomes.

Currently, I work fulltime at Smartcar as a software engineer. Will add more about my role in the coming days!
